CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 18, 1954, pg. 12 reads:" Couple Celebrate Golden Anniversary...Mr. and Mrs. Percy Traynham - Harris Photo." Portion of accompanying article by Alma A. Polk reads: "The Percy Traynhams' 50th Year Is Beautifully Celebrated - A beautiful double ring wedding ceremony in which all three grandchildren participated featured the golden anniversary of Mr. and Mrs. Percy Traynham on Monday evening in their lovely home at 28 Horton Street.  The Rev. A.A. Nelson, pastor of Trinity AME Church, performed the ceremony..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Percy Traynham and Mrs. Traynham seated center, surrounding by family and friends, possibly including Oria Traynham (Coy) standing fifth from left, posed during fiftieth anniversary celebration in Traynham home, 28 Horton Street
